import React, { Component } from 'react' class SignupPage extends Component { onSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() fetch('http://localhost:3003/users/signup', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ username: this.state.username, password: this.state.password, email: this.state.email }), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }).then(res => console.log(res.json())) } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } render() { return (
  back to home

) } } export default SignupPage
